companyOverview.sectionSubtitle: Prepare for a new smart life with DBCS.
companyOverview.tagline: Prepare for a new smart life with DBCS.

timeline.title: ITS Service
timeline.subtitle: Frontier
items: Started as a subsidiary of Korea Expressway Corporation in 1996, performing highway traffic system maintenance
Expanded traffic system maintenance to national roads, city roads, airports, and tunnels since 2002
Self-developed and produced ITS-related products such as variable message signs and vehicle recognition devices
The only company in Korea with total solutions for design, construction, and maintenance in traffic systems

timeline.title: ITS Total Service
timeline.subtitle: Provider
items: Optimized system development and construction for public institutions including government, defense, and local governments
24/7 non-stop operation and management of core national IT facilities
Providing highest quality services through continuous quality management (ISO 9001, ISO/IEC 20000, ISO/IEC 27001, CMMI Lv.3, SQ Excellence, ISO 37001, ISO 45001)
Ranked 4th in construction capability among 10,052 companies (as of 2020)

timeline.title: Digital
timeline.subtitle: Transformation Partner
items: Next-generation traffic paradigm leader opening the era of safe and intelligent road transportation
Innovation partner for next-generation information systems in welfare, finance, and public administration
Platform operator for co-evolution of smart ecosystem
Core solution distribution hub for Industry 4.0 and the 4th Industrial Revolution

companyInfo.name: DBCS Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.mainBusiness: ITS construction and operation management, tunnel maintenance, smart city, system integration (SI), IT consulting, IT outsourcing, IT solution distribution (AI video analysis solutions, etc.)

businessPhilosophy.sectionSubtitle: Creating happiness for customers. DBCS is building an IT world for everyone.

mission.label: Mission
mission.content: A company that provides a better living environment for humanity based on service and technology

workingStandards.title: Profitability
workingStandards.description: The first criterion for deciding whether to pursue a business, and promised financial value must be secured within the promised period

workingStandards.title: Risk Management
workingStandards.description: The highest principle that guarantees the company's survival and cannot be compromised

workingStandards.title: Trust
workingStandards.description: Trusting and being trusted by employees, customers, and partners

workingStandards.title: Teamwork
workingStandards.description: Working as one team and thinking of the team first

workingStandards.title: Challenge
workingStandards.description: Never miss opportunities with quick decision-making and fast execution
